title: Kaze Tachinu: Miyazaki Hayao no Mousou Comeback
original_name: 風立ちぬ 宮崎駿の妄想カムバック
sinopse: Kaze Tachinu focuses on Jirou Horikoshi, the designer of Japan's famed Mitsubishi A6M Zero fighter plane of World War II. It also adapts Tatsuo Hori's 1936–37 novelette of the same name, which follows the tentative relationship with a male narrator and Setsuko who suffers from encroaching tuberculosis.
